attributes.action: formally make know that vote of No confidence in the Speaker is a free vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reputation of Parliament requires that the Speaker Michael Martin stands down. 

The integrity of House of Commons has been so badly effected that new leadership is required. 

A free vote of the entire House is essential.

Yours sincerely

George Laird
The Campaign for Human Rights at Glasgow University

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
